mapper.insert: insert into STH_TERRITORIAL_ORGAN ( TER_ORGAN_ID, MRDV_ID, TER_ORGAN_NAME, TER_ORGAN_SHORT_NAME, TER_ORGAN_COMPANY_NAME, TER_ORGAN_CODE, TER_ORGAN_ADDRESS, TER_ORGAN_HEAD_NAME, TER_ORGAN_PHONE, TER_ORGAN_OKATO, TER_ORGAN_INN, TER_ORGAN_KPP, TER_ORGAN_OGRN, TER_ORGAN_COMMENT) values ( #{id}, (SELECT MRDV_ID FROM STH_MAIN_REG_DIV_PFR WHERE MRDV_CURRENT=1 FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY), #{name}, #{shortName}, #{companyName}, #{code}, #{address}, #{headName}, #{phone}, #{okato}, #{inn}, #{kpp}, #{ogrn}, #{comment} )
